quote_first: The report was dated Sunday, 25 September, 1966, at
quote_last: . The text was laconic. Call from Hrk Vanger; stating that his brother’s daughter (?) Harriett Ulrika Vanger, born 15 June 1960 has been missing from her home on Hedley Island since Saturday afternoon.
title: The Girl With The Dragon Tattoo
author: Stieg Larsson

quote_first:
When they’d finished thier burgers, Melissa glanced at her watch, a big plastic digital thing that looked like it should belong to a child.
“
quote_last: ,” Melissa said. “We’ve still got forty-four minutes to kill before the end of the world.”
title: The Glass Hotel
author: Emily St. John Mandel
